comments:
I20060117-0800
To reproduce open a manifest.mf. go to the manifest.mf tab and do Ctrl+F.

Doug, do you know what the deal is here?   we are getting two similar bug reports about class cast exceptions using today's build.

Given the changes I've made, I wouldn't be surprised if it is something I've done.  But, looking at the code in PDEFormPage, it's not clear what it's trying to do (or more accurately: why the code assumes a blind cast to PDEFormPage will work, and why it isn't working anymore).
*** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 124149 ***
